title: Presidential nomination sent to the Senate, 10/7/09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




October 07, 2009

 



Presidential nomination sent to the Senate, 10/7/09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                        October 7, 2009 NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Patrick Gallagher, of Maryland, to be Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology, vice William Alan Jeffrey.
